name: FarmUp!
description:
WASD - Move
J - Grab/Throw
K - Use held object

Gamepad left joystick - Move
Xbox A - Grab/Throw
Xbox X - Use held object

Farm Up! is the panic inducing agriculture simulator you’ve been waiting your whole life for. Plant, water, and harvest your crops for points but beware; letting crops wither on the vine or sitting on too many seeds will quickly end your budding career. The only way to get ahead is to plant fast and harvest even faster!

Credits

Anthony Diggle - Engineering
James Lockett - Engineering
Marco Marino - Engineering
Tony Dong - Art

Uses Free Selection Outline

Uses Top Down Shooter Controller

Uses assets from kenney.nl

Uses assets from zapsplat.com
